title: OJS Worker Info
description: Worker registration and heartbeat information for OJS. Describes a worker process including its identity, subscribed queues, concurrency, lifecycle state, and active jobs.

worker_id.title: Worker ID
worker_id.description: Globally unique identifier for the worker process. UUIDv7 RECOMMENDED.

hostname.title: Hostname
hostname.description: Machine hostname where the worker process runs.

pid.title: Process ID
pid.description: Operating system process ID of the worker.

queues.title: Subscribed Queues
queues.description: Ordered list of queues the worker is subscribed to. Queue priority is left-to-right.

concurrency.title: Concurrency
concurrency.description: Maximum number of jobs this worker can process in parallel.

state.title: Worker State
state.description: Current lifecycle state of the worker. 'running' is normal operation, 'quiet' means stop fetching but finish active jobs, 'terminate' means shut down after active jobs complete.

labels.title: Labels
labels.description: Arbitrary labels for worker filtering and identification.

active_jobs.title: Active Job Count
active_jobs.description: Number of jobs currently being processed by this worker.

active_job_ids.title: Active Job IDs
active_job_ids.description: IDs of all jobs currently being processed by this worker.

started_at.title: Started At
started_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the worker process started.

last_heartbeat_at.title: Last Heartbeat At
last_heartbeat_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of the worker's most recent heartbeat. System-managed.
